snippet.title: Hello Goodboy Gameplay Trailer v4.2
snippet.description:
Hello Goodboy is a heartwarming, wholesome adventure featuring Iko, a kid new to the afterlife. With no memory of what brought him to the world beyond, Iko must rely on Coco, a strangely familiar dog who will help him solve the mysteries of this new existence.

Coming to Steam, Epic Game Store, and Nintendo Switch in Q2 2023.

Developer: Rolling Glory Jam
Publisher: Freedom Games

Follow Rolling Glory Jam on Twitter: https://twitter.com/rollinggloryjam
Find our other game and media: https://linktr.ee/rollinggloryjam
